description: Coach celebrates the client's progress and learning.
demonstrationExamples: Acknowledging client's insights with 'What a powerful realization you've come to today'
Celebrating progress with 'I want to acknowledge the courage it took to make that decision'
Highlighting growth with 'Look at how far you've come since we started working together'
Recognizing effort with 'The work you've done here today reflects your commitment to your growth'
Noting patterns of development with 'I notice how you're approaching challenges with a new perspective now'
